Name: Flowers Garden Solitaire
About the game: In this Solitaire card game, we invite you to find yourself in the world of flowers and gardens. Discover the many-colored world of flowers. From desert flowers and cacti to flowering cherry blossoms and to lake lilies. Relax and enjoy the beautiful world of flowers, releasing heavy thoughts and tension. You are waiting for 12 gardens in different parts of the world, fascinating maps and meditative gameplay. For your achievements you will be rewarded with wonderful trophies. - discover 12 fantastic gardens - play 120 unique levels - relaxing music - beautiful graphics
